column1: Post weaning, the offspring were switched to an isocaloric control diet consisting of 14% fat ( from soybean oil, Fiber - Balanced Monkey Diet 5052, Lab Diet, St. Louis, MO). Fig.

column1: For K / BxN colonization experiments, three - week - old SPF K / BxN mice were treated with ampicillin ( 1g / L), neomycin ( 1g / L), and metronidazole ( 1g / L) for 10 days.

Subsequently, rats were randomized in two groups ( n = 10 each) and were either fed with a standard diet supplemented with COLOSTRONONI ( Product Number 934744602, Lot # A04268, Guna S. p. a., Milan, Italy) dissolved in sucrose solution ( 2%) ( CN group) [ 0. 500 gr / kg ( w / w)], or maintained with a standard diet supplemented with sucrose solution ( 2%) ( CTRL group) for the following 12 days.
